GetCollisionInfoDatabaseWriter(DatabaseType, ITissue, string, string)

Static method to instantiate correct CollisionInfoDatabaseWriter given a virtual boundary DatabaseType, path to where to output database and database filename.

public static CollisionInfoDatabaseWriter GetCollisionInfoDatabaseWriter(DatabaseType databaseType, ITissue tissue, string filePath, string outputName)

GetCollisionInfoDatabaseWriters(IList<DatabaseType>, ITissue, string, string)

Static method to provide list of CollisionInfoDatabaseWriters. It calls the method to instantiate one CollisionInfoDatabaseWriter, GetCollisionInfoDatabaseWriter, for all elements in the list of virtual boundary DatabaseType.

public static IList<CollisionInfoDatabaseWriter> GetCollisionInfoDatabaseWriters(IList<DatabaseType> databaseTypes, ITissue tissue, string filePath, string outputName)

Parameters

list of database types

tissue ITissue

ITissue needed to instantiate Writer to know how many regions

filePath string

path string of database output

outputName string

filename string of output file

Returns
